item.title: Simple Shortcode To add raw html
item.description: Simple Shortcode To add raw html This is raw HTML, inside Markdown. And here is a feather icon!!! And the Rating, which could be set up as separate hard coded short codes, so star-1, star-2, etc. There must be a way to input the number of stars as a variable. Other links to follow up Structured book data in Hugo posts Adding web mentions Adding syndication URLs

item.title: 0744 Icon Libraries
item.description: A youtube video was watched but still to be noted here. SVG SVG on the web bootstrap v5 icons Now has SVG icons. fontawesome The font of icons. feather icons Feather Icons github feather icons with instructions 286 icons in SVG or via JS lordicon css.gg material-ui
